content: click here for free video pattern tutorial ** 3d rose coaster tutorial 1 ** click here to purchase our printable pdf pattern ** 3d rose coaster pdf 2 ** we re crafting something pretty and useful in more ways than one its the crochet 3d rose coaster if you re a fan of roses crocheting coasters or a beginner searching for an easy pattern this tutorial is perfect for you our 3d rose coaster does double duty as a sweet coaster and after a 3-second transformation as a beautiful rose this beautiful coaster makes a wonderful valentine s day mothers day christmas or just an any-day gift join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a 3d rose coaster from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own 3d rose coaster to show off to your friends in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this flower bouquet coaster tutorial both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn - this pattern works best with medium weight weight four yarn or its equivalent it does not work with thick or blanket yarn depending on how many coasters you want to make and how many colors you want to use prepare at least 20grams maybe a quarter of a skein of every color you are using you need a base color eg white or beige green a heart color red pink and a petal color any color you like * 3mm crochet hook * scissors if you want your coaster to be the same size as mine use any yarn that can fit nicely on a 3mm hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet the 3d rose coaster * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/nkpd1xbc0_e 2 https //crochetmusings net/products/3d-rose-coaster-crochet-pattern-pdf utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=designs&utm_content=product_link&utm_campaign=3d-rose-coaster
